35 /* Author: Mathias LÃ¼dtke */
36 
37 #include <moveit/setup_assistant/tools/moveit_config_data.h>
38 #include <moveit/rdf_loader/rdf_loader.h>
39 
40 #include <boost/program_options.hpp>
41 
42 namespace po = boost::program_options;
43 
44 bool loadSetupAssistantConfig(moveit_setup_assistant::MoveItConfigData& config_data, const std::string& pkg_path)
45 {
46  if (!config_data.setPackagePath(pkg_path))
47  {
48  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not set package path '" << pkg_path << "'");
49  return false;
50  }
51 
52  std::string setup_assistant_path;
53  if (!config_data.getSetupAssistantYAMLPath(setup_assistant_path))
54  {
55  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not resolve path to .setup_assistant");
56  return false;
57  }
58 
59  if (!config_data.inputSetupAssistantYAML(setup_assistant_path))
60  {
61  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not parse .setup_assistant file from '" << setup_assistant_path << "'");
62  return false;
63  }
64 
65  config_data.createFullURDFPath(); // might fail at this point
66 
67  config_data.createFullSRDFPath(config_data.config_pkg_path_); // might fail at this point
68 
69  return true;
70 }
71 
72 bool setup(moveit_setup_assistant::MoveItConfigData& config_data, bool keep_old,
73  const std::vector<std::string>& xacro_args)
74 {
75  std::string urdf_string;
76  if (!rdf_loader::RDFLoader::loadXmlFileToString(urdf_string, config_data.urdf_path_, xacro_args))
77  {
78  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not load URDF from '" << config_data.urdf_path_ << "'");
79  return false;
80  }
81  if (!config_data.urdf_model_->initString(urdf_string))
82  {
83  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not parse URDF from '" << config_data.urdf_path_ << "'");
84  return false;
85  }
86 
87  std::string srdf_string;
88  if (!rdf_loader::RDFLoader::loadXmlFileToString(srdf_string, config_data.srdf_path_, xacro_args))
89  {
90  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not load SRDF from '" << config_data.srdf_path_ << "'");
91  return false;
92  }
93  if (!config_data.srdf_->initString(*config_data.urdf_model_, srdf_string))
94  {
95  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not parse SRDF from '" << config_data.srdf_path_ << "'");
96  return false;
97  }
98 
99  if (!keep_old)
100  config_data.srdf_->disabled_collisions_.clear();
101 
102  return true;
103 }
104 
105 moveit_setup_assistant::LinkPairMap compute(moveit_setup_assistant::MoveItConfigData& config_data, uint32_t trials,
106  double min_collision_fraction, bool verbose)
107 {
108  // TODO: spin thread and print progess if verbose
109  unsigned int collision_progress;
110  return moveit_setup_assistant::computeDefaultCollisions(config_data.getPlanningScene(), &collision_progress,
111  trials > 0, trials, min_collision_fraction, verbose);
112 }
113 
114 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
115 {
116  std::string config_pkg_path;
117  std::string urdf_path;
118  std::string srdf_path;
119 
120  std::string output_path;
121 
122  bool include_default = false, include_always = false, keep_old = false, verbose = false;
123 
124  double min_collision_fraction = 1.0;
125 
126  uint32_t never_trials = 0;
127 
128  po::options_description desc("Allowed options");
129  desc.add_options()("help", "show help")("config-pkg", po::value(&config_pkg_path), "path to MoveIt config package")(
130  "urdf", po::value(&urdf_path),
131  "path to URDF ( or xacro)")("srdf", po::value(&srdf_path),
132  "path to SRDF ( or xacro)")("output", po::value(&output_path), "output path for SRDF")
133 
134  ("xacro-args", po::value<std::vector<std::string> >()->composing(), "additional arguments for xacro")
135 
136  ("default", po::bool_switch(&include_default), "disable default colliding pairs")(
137  "always", po::bool_switch(&include_always), "disable always colliding pairs")
138 
139  ("keep", po::bool_switch(&keep_old), "keep disabled link from SRDF")("verbose", po::bool_switch(&verbose),
140  "verbose output")
141 
142  ("trials", po::value(&never_trials), "number of trials for searching never colliding pairs")(
143  "min-collision-fraction", po::value(&min_collision_fraction),
144  "fraction of small sample size to determine links that are alwas colliding");
145 
146  po::positional_options_description pos_desc;
147  pos_desc.add("xacro-args", -1);
148 
149  po::variables_map vm;
150  po::store(po::command_line_parser(argc, argv).options(desc).positional(pos_desc).run(), vm);
151  po::notify(vm);
152 
153  if (vm.count("help"))
154  {
155  std::cout << desc << std::endl;
156  return 1;
157  }
158 
159  moveit_setup_assistant::MoveItConfigData config_data;
160 
161  if (!config_pkg_path.empty())
162  {
163  if (!loadSetupAssistantConfig(config_data, config_pkg_path))
164  {
165  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not load config at '" << config_pkg_path << "'");
166  return 1;
167  }
168  }
169  else if (urdf_path.empty() || srdf_path.empty())
170  {
171  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Please provide config package or URDF and SRDF path");
172  return 1;
173  }
174  else if (rdf_loader::RDFLoader::isXacroFile(srdf_path) && output_path.empty())
175  {
176  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Please provide a different output file for SRDF xacro input file");
177  return 1;
178  }
179 
180  // overwrite config paths if applicable
181  if (!urdf_path.empty())
182  config_data.urdf_path_ = urdf_path;
183  if (!srdf_path.empty())
184  config_data.srdf_path_ = srdf_path;
185 
186  std::vector<std::string> xacro_args;
187  if (vm.count("xacro-args"))
188  xacro_args = vm["xacro-args"].as<std::vector<std::string> >();
189 
190  if (!setup(config_data, keep_old, xacro_args))
191  {
192  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not setup updater");
193  return 1;
194  }
195 
196  moveit_setup_assistant::LinkPairMap link_pairs = compute(config_data, never_trials, min_collision_fraction, verbose);
197 
198  size_t skip_mask = 0;
199  if (!include_default)
200  skip_mask |= (1 << moveit_setup_assistant::DEFAULT);
201  if (!include_always)
202  skip_mask |= (1 << moveit_setup_assistant::ALWAYS);
203 
204  config_data.setCollisionLinkPairs(link_pairs, skip_mask);
205 
206  config_data.srdf_->writeSRDF(output_path.empty() ? config_data.srdf_path_ : output_path);
207 
208  return 0;
209 }
